column4: i've just installed 8.10 and I'm in love; however, I have a Dell E1405 with the broadcom "Draft-N" card that dell offered 2 years ago. The card is not detected, is there a driver update or easy way to fix this? I read the forums a bit but everything seems to be for 8.04 and is 2-3 years old.
broadcom cards need restricted drivers in order to run
it means you need to get that laptop connected to the internet so it can download the drivers
